languages.text: {n}Вы внимательно изучаете руны — и внезапно чувствуете острую резь в глазах, за которой следует укол боли в груди. Вы отшатываетесь от когитатора с заполошно бьющимся сердцем и гулом в ушах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы внимательно изучаете руны — и внезапно чувствуете острую резь в глазах, за которой следует укол боли в груди. Вы отшатываетесь от когитатора с заполошно бьющимся сердцем и гулом в ушах.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You study the runes carefully — and suddenly you feel a lancing pain in your eyes, followed by a sharp pang in your chest. You leap away from the cogitator, with your heart pounding and a rushing in your ears.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы внимательно изучаете руны — и внезапно чувствуете острую резь в глазах, за которой следует укол боли в груди. Вы отшатываетесь от когитатора с заполошно бьющимся сердцем и гулом в ушах.{/n}

{n}You study the runes carefully — and suddenly you feel a lancing pain in your eyes, followed by a sharp pang in your chest. You leap away from the cogitator, with your heart pounding and a rushing in your ears.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你仔细研究着这些文字。突然之间，你感到眼睛一阵刺痛，紧接着胸口传来一阵剧痛。你赶紧离开了沉思者，心脏砰砰作响，耳边传来阵阵轰鸣。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the runes carefully — and suddenly you feel a lancing pain in your eyes, followed by a sharp pang in your chest. You leap away from the cogitator, with your heart pounding and a rushing in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你仔细研究着这些文字。突然之间，你感到眼睛一阵刺痛，紧接着胸口传来一阵剧痛。你赶紧离开了思考器，心脏砰砰作响，耳边传来阵阵轰鸣。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Estudias las runas con atención, y de repente te atraviesa un dolor punzante en los ojos seguido de un fuerte pinchazo en el pecho. Te alejas de un salto del cogitador, con los latidos desenfrenados de tu corazón palpitando en tus oídos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the runes carefully — and suddenly you feel a lancing pain in your eyes, followed by a sharp pang in your chest. You leap away from the cogitator, with your heart pounding and a rushing in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Estudias las runas con atención, y de repente te atraviesa un dolor punzante en los ojos seguido de un fuerte pinchazo en el pecho. Te alejas de un salto del cogitador, con los latidos desenfrenados de tu corazón palpitando en tus oídos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは慎重にルーンを調べる…すると突然、目に痛みが走り、胸に鋭い痛みが走った。心臓が拍動し、耳鳴りがし、あなたは考算機から飛び退った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the runes carefully — and suddenly you feel a lancing pain in your eyes, followed by a sharp pang in your chest. You leap away from the cogitator, with your heart pounding and a rushing in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは慎重にルーンを調べる…すると突然、目に痛みが走り、胸に鋭い痛みが走った。心臓が拍動し、耳鳴りがし、あなたは考算機から飛び退った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du studierst die Runen sorgfältig – und plötzlich spürst du einen stechenden Schmerz, erst in deinen Augen, dann in der Brust. Du weichst vor dem Cogitator zurück, dein Herz pocht und in deinen Ohren tobt ein Rauschen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the runes carefully — and suddenly you feel a lancing pain in your eyes, followed by a sharp pang in your chest. You leap away from the cogitator, with your heart pounding and a rushing in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du studierst die Runen sorgfältig – und plötzlich spürst du einen stechenden Schmerz, erst in deinen Augen, dann in der Brust. Du weichst vor dem Cogitator zurück, dein Herz pocht und in deinen Ohren tobt ein Rauschen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alors que vous étudiez attentivement les runes, vous sentez soudain une douleur perçante dans vos yeux, suivie d'un élancement dans votre poitrine. Vous reculez d'un bond, les battements effrénés de votre cœur résonant dans vos oreilles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the runes carefully — and suddenly you feel a lancing pain in your eyes, followed by a sharp pang in your chest. You leap away from the cogitator, with your heart pounding and a rushing in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que vous étudiez attentivement les runes, vous sentez soudain une douleur perçante dans vos yeux, suivie d'un élancement dans votre poitrine. Vous reculez d'un bond, les battements effrénés de votre cœur résonant dans vos oreilles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rünleri dikkatlice inceliyorken aniden gözlerine ağrı battığını hissediyorsun. Bu ağrıyı, göğsüne saplanan bir sancı takip ediyor. Kendini kavramsayarın uzağına atıyorsun. Kalbin hızla çarparken kulakların çınlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the runes carefully — and suddenly you feel a lancing pain in your eyes, followed by a sharp pang in your chest. You leap away from the cogitator, with your heart pounding and a rushing in your ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Rünleri dikkatlice inceliyorken aniden gözlerine batan bir ağrı hissediyorsun. Bu ağrıyı, göğsüne saplanan bir sancı takip ediyor. Kendini kavramsayarın uzağına atıyorsun. Kalbin hızla çarparken kulakların çınlıyor.{/n}
